### Press Release

###  LCNB Corp. Announces 2024 Fourth-Quarter Dividend

Company Release - 11/18/2024

Download the PDF version PDF Format (opens in new window)

LEBANON, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)--  LCNB Corp. (Nasdaq: LCNB) today announced that the Company’s Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.22 per common share. The common stock cash dividend will have a record date of December 2, 2024, and is payable to shareholders on December 16, 2024. 

**About LCNB Corp.**

LCNB Corp. is a financial holding company headquartered in Lebanon, Ohio. Through its subsidiary, LCNB National Bank (the “Bank”), it serves customers and communities in Southwest and South-Central Ohio and Northern Kentucky. A financial institution with a long tradition for building strong relationships with customers and communities, the Bank offers convenient banking locations in Butler, Clermont, Clinton, Fayette, Franklin, Hamilton, Montgomery, Preble, Ross, and Warren Counties, Ohio. The Bank also provides community-oriented banking services to customers in Northern Kentucky through a bank office in Boone County, Kentucky. The Bank continually strives to exceed customer expectations and provides an array of services for all personal and business banking needs including checking, savings, online banking, personal lending, business lending, agricultural lending, business support, deposit and treasury, investment services, trust and IRAs and stock purchases. LCNB Corp. common shares are traded on the NASDAQ Capital Market Exchange® under the symbol “LCNB.” Learn more about LCNB Corp. at [www.lcnb.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lcnb.com&esheet=54154337&newsitemid=20241118891077&lan=en-US&anchor=www.lcnb.com&index=1&md5=04b672f9c2d2c2be33ef0964854442bb). 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241118891077r1&sid=q4-prod&distro=nx&lang=en)

P.O. Box 59 Lebanon, OH 45036 **Company Contact:** Eric J. Meilstrup President and Chief Executive Officer LCNB National Bank (513) 932-1414 Shareholderrelations@lcnb.com  **Investor and Media Contact:** Andrew M. Berger Managing Director SM Berger & Company, Inc. (216) 464-6400 andrew@smberger.com

Source: LCNB Corp.

# Press Release

###  LCNB Corp. Announces 2024 Third Quarter Dividend

Company Release - 8/22/2024

Download the PDF version PDF Format (opens in new window)

LEBANON, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)--  LCNB Corp. (Nasdaq: LCNB) today announced that the Company’s Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.22 per common share. The common stock cash dividend will have a record date of September 3, 2024, and is payable to shareholders on September 16, 2024. 

**About LCNB Corp.**

LCNB Corp. is a financial holding company headquartered in Lebanon, Ohio. Through its subsidiary, LCNB National Bank (the “Bank”), it serves customers and communities in Southwest and South-Central Ohio and Northern Kentucky. A financial institution with a long tradition for building strong relationships with customers and communities, the Bank offers convenient banking locations in Butler, Clermont, Clinton, Fayette, Franklin, Hamilton, Montgomery, Preble, Ross, and Warren Counties, Ohio. The Bank also provides community-oriented banking services to customers in Northern Kentucky through a bank office in Boone County, Kentucky. The Bank continually strives to exceed customer expectations and provides an array of services for all personal and business banking needs including checking, savings, online banking, personal lending, business lending, agricultural lending, business support, deposit and treasury, investment services, trust and IRAs and stock purchases. LCNB Corp. common shares are traded on the NASDAQ Capital Market Exchange® under the symbol “LCNB.” Learn more about LCNB Corp. at [www.lcnb.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lcnb.com&esheet=54112592&newsitemid=20240822017113&lan=en-US&anchor=www.lcnb.com&index=1&md5=d6086621d065b0b87135a5d815fa39b0) . 

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20240822017113r1&sid=q4-prod&distro=nx&lang=en)

**Company Contact:** Eric J. Meilstrup President and Chief Executive Officer LCNB National Bank (513) 932-1414 Shareholderrelations@lcnb.com

**Investor and Media Contact:** Andrew M. Berger Managing Director SM Berger & Company, Inc. (216) 464-6400 andrew@smberger.com

Source: LCNB Corp.
